body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting us. My name is Benjamin Stewart and I'm from Carville Autos. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hello, my name is Evelyn Cooper.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Evelyn. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm feeling disappointed with the customer service I received.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm sorry to hear that, Evelyn. To better assist you, may I have your phone number formatted as seven six zero, two one zero, four five eight nine and your email address spelled out for accuracy?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my phone number is seven six zero, two one zero, four five eight nine, and my email address is evelyn dot cooper at example dot com.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for providing that information, Evelyn. Is there anything else you'd like to share with me today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Not at the moment. I appreciate your assistance.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Evelyn. Thank you for reaching out to us. Have a great day.
